description.value: Your muse is a virtuoso, inspiring you to greater heights. If it's a creature, it might be a performance-loving creature such as a choral angel or lillend azata; if a deity, it might be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Item.Shelyn]. As a bard with a maestro muse, you are an inspiration to your allies and confident of your musical and oratorical abilities. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Lingering Composition] feat and add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Soothe] to your spell repertoire.
